project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions to the user and tracks their score.

task.name: Implement the core game loop to present questions and capture user input
Store questions and answers in a variable within the code
Calculate and track the user's score based on their answers
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for each feature implemented above (game loop, scoring, question handling)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
